question: Consider the map given below : The dotted (broken) line in the map is the
option3: line of demarcation between India and Pakistan suggested by the Boundary Commission (1947)
option4: route followed by the Young husband Expedition
explanation: The Durand line refers to the border between Pakistan and Afghanistan. The Durand line came into existence on November 12, 1896, when the border which was used to separate the British and the Afghanistan territories came to life.
